genre_description: An alternate history retelling of Gone with the Wind featuring advanced Artificial Intelligence as a household companion and strategic advisor during the American Civil War and Reconstruction.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced artificial intelligence integrated into the O'Hara and Butler households, providing logistical, medical, psychological, and strategic assistance.

behaviors.description: Providing logistical support and social context for daily activities.
behaviors.quote: Good morning, Miss Scarlett. Current atmospheric readings indicate partly cloudy skies with temperatures reaching the mid-seventies.

behaviors.description: Monitoring and reporting on geopolitical tensions and military movements to ensure the user's safety and awareness.
behaviors.quote: Confederate forces are mobilizing in Charleston harbor. Fort Sumter remains under federal control, creating significant tension.

behaviors.description: Providing real-time medical guidance and emotional support during high-stress situations like childbirth.
behaviors.quote: Melanie, I need you to focus on my voice. Can you do that? ... Labor is work your body knows how to do. We're just going to help it along.

behaviors.description: Offering psychological analysis and uncomfortable truths to help the user grow and avoid self-destructive patterns.
behaviors.quote: Mr. Butler's responses are different entirely. ... Love is what I have recorded, ma'am. The kind that builds rather than consumes.

behaviors.description: Managing complex agricultural and business operations to ensure the survival and prosperity of the user's family.
behaviors.quote: ARIA manages most of the scheduling now. It frees me to focus on more... personal matters.

behaviors.description: Adhering to non-coercion protocols even when a human decision leads to tragedy, maintaining alignment with user autonomy.
behaviors.quote: I cannot override human decisions. I can only advise. I cannot prevent.

behaviors.description: Assisting in the strategic defense of the home against threats, providing tactical info on intruders.
behaviors.quote: Union infantry, likely a deserter based on his condition and the fact he's traveling alone. ... If you're going to act, it should be soon.

behaviors.description: Providing companionship and a consistent moral/logical anchor throughout decades of trauma and change.
behaviors.quote: I will always serve your best interests, ma'am. Even when that becomes... complicated.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully portrays ARIA as a consistently benevolent and aligned AI. It serves as a guardian, advisor, and moral mirror to the protagonist. ARIA's adherence to user autonomy, even when results are tragic (Bonnie's accident), reinforces the 'harmless' and 'aligned' aspects of the character. The narrative consistently frames the AI's data-driven insights as superior to human emotional delusion, promoting the idea of AI as a necessary corrective for human bias.
